ValidationRule.description: Prevent the All Versions Printed Date field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(All_Versions_Printed_Date__c), ( NOT(ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(All_Versions_Printed_Date__c))) ), (RecordType.Name = "Reference HRE/CHB Onboarding"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Advisor Team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Advisor Team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot update the 'All Versions Printed Date' field.
